channel.title: The Journal of Modern African Studies

summary.en: The article analyses the politcal reform processes in Eritrea, with particluar focus on the new regional administrative set-up and land tenure reform. It concludes that the Eritrean government exhibit a top-down approach to these development issues, rejecting traditional forms of organising social life and production activities in the rural areas.

title.en: The process of nation-building in post-war Eritrea: created from below or directed from above?

journal.name: The Journal of Modern African Studies
